channel.title: Offering full-active Administration/Function... > read
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hello Everyone
This is probably the wrong section, although I don't know where this should be put elsewhere.
I am LangKampo, 15 years old, I live in The Netherlands. I started messing around with RSPS when I was 10, so you could say I'm quite experienced. I started along with my IRL bud, we created multiple servers. LiquidX was by far my best project (667 loading 728)
(The banner below, while running "LiquidX2" (637/639) [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/345hgqp.png[/img]
(I am also a grahpics designer!)
But as of now, I realise that I don't want to be running a server as the main owner. I love to administrate, handle problems, donations, help people with "not working" clients as I am good with PC issues, I love to moderate ingame, hangout ingame, pretty much everything to do with RSPS. I also love to be administrative on forums. I'm pretty experienced with PHP, vBulletin, and such.
So, as you could guess allready, I am looking for a community to join as staff. This is the information I guess that could be useful for owners/admins: - I live in The Netherlands - Timezone GMT+1 - I am in school, but very active outside school, even AFK, still responding - I speak Dutch, English, a bit of German and can understand some french - Always in mood for helping, even with things that ain't my job
I would like to join a server as one of the following ranks, which really needs to be done, as I like to work to see a server growing and run perfectly. - Game Moderator - Forum Administrator - Game Administrator - Game Administrator+ (Help with developing when you need me, I am pretty experienced with it) - Game Developer (I don't prefer this ATM because I didn't work with anything above 667 yet)
I really hope someone needs me and can use my help.
You can contact me here on Mopar via Thread OR PM. Or at the following services: [img]http://amittiwari.net/wp-content/uploads/2011/08/small_skype_icon.png[/img] LK0548 [img]http://www.rayleighhifi.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/11/Twitter-icon.png[/img] @_LK0548
Thanks alot for reading .
LangKampo [/CENTER]

@BILF wrote:

Thanks, I guess I should look in that section!

item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

If you are looking to join a team, visit the Development teams section and join a team that suits your interests As far as where this post belongs, your best bet would be in the Development teams section.

Read full topic

item.description:
@BILF wrote:

[CENTER]Hello Everyone

This is probably the wrong section, although I don’t know where this should be put elsewhere.

I am LangKampo, 15 years old, I live in The Netherlands.
I started messing around with RSPS when I was 10, so you could say I’m quite experienced. I started along with my IRL bud, we created multiple servers. LiquidX was by far my best project (667 loading 728)

@_LK0548
